EmailTemplate.name: Thanks for sharing your comments (1409889453.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for sharing your comments (1409889453.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false false EN-US ZH-TW AR-SA Mr. Winkler- Just a quick note to thank you for sharing your thoughts about your experience with Astrum Solar. We are really happy to hear about your dramatically lower utility bills! Hearing from existing customers is essential to our efforts to consistently improve our processes, so we appreciate you taking the time to comment. Your comments are also an important part of our efforts to build our customer base so we hope you will share your thoughts as well. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to help you with your system or if you might have friends or family we can help with lower electricity bills. Best regards,Jose <http://www.astrumsolar.com/> Jose RamosChief Marketing OfficerP 707.495.8049 <tel:707.495.8049>F 855.850.3351 <tel:855.850.3351>E jose.ramos@astrumsolar.com <mailto:jose.ramos@astrumsolar.com>6200 Stoneridge Mall Road, Suite 300Pleasanton, CA 94588www.astrumsolar.com <http://www.astrumsolar.com/>
